DOC.brief_summary: The purpose feasibility study compare AIR OPTIX® COLORS contact lens manufacture use automated process AIR OPTIX® COLORS contact lens manufacture use semi-automatic process .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Manufacturing Processes AIR OPTIX® COLORS Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: Able willing sign write Informed Consent form . Cylinder ≤ 0.75 diopter ( D ) . Able achieve visual acuity ( VA ) least 20/30 Snellen eye distance contact lenses ( CLCVA ) best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) ≥ 20/25 . Have spectacle provide acceptable vision willing wear unable wear study lenses . Successful daily wear singlevision spherical soft contact lenses eye past 3 month minimum 8 hours/day , 5 days/week . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Eye injury surgery within twelve week immediately prior enrollment trial . Preexisting ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Currently enrol ophthalmic clinical trial . Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection , disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution , determine investigator . Pathologically dry eye . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
